content: While he doesn't have a ton of health or as much defense as other bosses, he can still get even more dangerous when low on health. His standard arm attack combo can be supercharged, causing icy explosions in a line from each of his swipes, and causing his slam to build up a giant frost area below him while also boxing you in a ring of icy crystals.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang' and the sub-subsection 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
While he doesn't have a ton of health or as much defense as other bosses, he can still get even more dangerous when low on health. His standard arm attack combo can be supercharged, causing icy explosions in a line from each of his swipes, and causing his slam to build up a giant frost area below him while also boxing you in a ring of icy crystals.
